LanguageData.AWL_AmmunitionCapacityText: The amount of ammunition filled in a magazine.
LanguageData.AWL_ReloadingTimeText: How long it takes to reload this weapon.
LanguageData.AWL_SingleShotLoadingText: This weapon is a single-reload weapon.
LanguageData.AWL_AmmunitionCostText: The amount of ammunition provided by each item.
LanguageData.AWL_MaxBackupAmmoText: The maximum number of spare ammunition for this weapon.
LanguageData.AWL_CanLoadExtra: Ammunition can be stored in the barrel
LanguageData.AWL_ShootingSkillMultipiler_Tips: The calculation formula for the shooting skill multiplier is 28/(20+ the shooting skill level of the current unit)
LanguageData.AWL_ManipulationMultipiler_Tips: The calculation formula for the operational capability multiplier is 150%/(50%+ operational capability (up to 200%)).
LanguageData.AWL_ReloadingTimeFactor_Tips: The reload multipiler of this pawn.
LanguageData.AWL_MoveReloadText: This weapon can be reloaded while moving.
